author: fitz
msg: Work on Issue 1192: Continue converting the Python tests to raise an
exception on test failure rather than returning an error code.
* prop_tests.py: Convert to the exception model.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix the correctness portion of issue #630: don't try to use a base
text in ra_dav's implementation of get_file().
(custom_get_request): Take new boolean arg `use_base', look for a
base version resource URL only if use_base is true.
(svn_client_switch): Remove the "FIXME" comment, and regularize the
call to svn_client__open_ra_session by passing a base_dir.  Adjust
related paths accordingly.  Also, reformat some nearby code that
